name: goatcounter
description: GoatCounter is a lightweight and privacy-friendly web analytics tool. It provides basic metrics, referrers, and pagesviews without collecting personal data, designed to be a simple alternative to Google Analytics.
features: Privacy-Friendly Analytics: Track website visits without cookies or personal data collection.
Essential Metrics: Monitor page views, unique visitors, referrers, and popular pages.
No Cookie Consent: Compliant with GDPR and privacy regulations without requiring cookie banners.
Lightweight Script: Minimal JavaScript footprint with negligible impact on page load times.
Real-Time Data: View visitor statistics and trends as they happen.
Referrer Tracking: Understand where your traffic comes from without invasive tracking.
Simple Dashboard: Clean, focused interface showing only the metrics that matter.
Self-Hosted Control: Keep all analytics data on your own server with complete ownership.
